channel.title: Tools on Ardenov
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Ardenov

item.title: Twitter Media Downloader
item.description: Download videos, images, and GIFs from Twitter (X) with ease. Enter the tweet link, select from available options based on size and quality, and save your media directly to your device. Perfect for video, image, and GIF downloads. Related: Twitter Video Downloader, Twitter Image Downloader, Twitter GIF Downloader
item.dc:creator: Ardenov

item.title: Character Diff Checker
item.description: Compare text with precision using Character Diff Checker. Detect and highlight even the smallest character-level differences with color-coded accuracy. Easily identify deletions, insertions, and line-level changes. Perfect for coders, editors, and anyone who needs a thorough text comparison tool.
item.dc:creator: Eugenius Wahyudiarto

item.title: Word Frequency Counter
item.description: Easily count and analyze word frequency in any text with our intuitive Word Frequency Counter tool. Simply paste your text, and get an ordered list of word frequencies, all within a clean and user-friendly interface.
item.dc:creator: Eugenius Wahyudiarto
